org.trianacode.taskgraph.proxy

Class ProxyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.proxy.ProxyFactory

  • public class ProxyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class for instantiating proxies from a map of its instance details.
